tool_description: Develops comedic story structures with proper narrative flow, character development, and escalating humor for longer-form comedic content.

story_premise.description: Basic premise or starting situation for the story

story_length.description: Target story length (short: 1-2 min, medium: 3-5 min, long: 5+ min)

escalation_pattern.description: How comedy escalates (gradual, sudden, cyclical, explosive)

character_count.description: Number of characters in the story (1-5)

resolution_type.description: Story resolution type (twist, ironic, absurd, heartwarming, cliffhanger)

error_messages: Invalid story length: Use one of [short, medium, long]
Invalid narrative style: Use one of [personal, fictional, observational, hypothetical]
Invalid escalation pattern: Use one of [gradual, sudden, cyclical, explosive]
Invalid character count: Must be integer between 1-5
Invalid resolution type: Use one of [twist, ironic, absurd, heartwarming, cliffhanger]
Empty story premise: Provide a basic premise or starting situation
usage: Input story_premise and story_length, customize narrative_style, escalation_pattern, character_count, and resolution_type to create structured comedic stories with proper pacing and development.

story_outline.description: Structured outline with story beats and comedy points

character_descriptions.description: Brief character descriptions and their roles

punchline_moments.description: Key comedic moments and punchlines throughout the story
